This game was a blast!  Currently playing it for a second time because it is fun, the characters are great, and it's a video game where you actually need to use your brain!

Wer schon am ersten Teil von Portal seinen Freude hatte, wird Portal 2 lieben. Knifflige Rätsel, witzige Dialoge und einen sehr gelungener Co-op-Modus machen das Spiel zu einem einem meiner Lieblingsspiele überhaupt.
It would take a lot to improve on the original Portal, but being much bigger and with the addition of co-op play this does it. Superb.
this was a really great game. the puzzles did have a bit of a steap learning curve if you you didn't play portal 1. it truely enforces old saying on how to beat the game. "think with portals"
Un juego indispensable para tu colección, te guste el género que te guste este te va a encantar. Un juego único y original con una historia divertidísima y muy intrigante.
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.

Sólo por el cooperativo ya merece la pena comprarlo.  El modo historia es genial, pero no  tan impactante como el del primero.

Lo de que segundas partes nunca fueron buenas, en este caso es una excepción.

Funny game, hooks you right from the start, many puzzles, a must play! The coop is even more interesting, just need to wait until valve learns the number 3 so we can enjoy more Portal! (You should play portal 1 too if you haven't yet!)

One of the best puzzle games out there, and it even has coop, which allows for even more complex puzzles. With the workshop there is a near endless supply of maps of all difficulties and for different tastes (true puzzle maps, race tracks, minigames etc.)

Seriously - excellent game overall. If you ever played the first game, then you will find P2 an improved and expanded version of first game. Graphics is better than in Portal, sounds and music are equally good. I don't know how, but they managed to deliver even better voiceacting.  Puzzles are awesome - new machanics add more variety and even more fun - puzzles are more complex now. Again the base game is simple, yet very entertaining, at first confusing (if you never touched the first game), but once you get a grasp of how things work you will lose track of time you spent playing it. If you never played it you will be surprised. This game has no challenges (like the first one), but it comes with coop mode! It's not harder than story puzzles, but definitely requires coordination with your partner. Coop is awesome! Second Portal is an excellent example of a game evolving into a better version. If you like solving puzzles, then it is a must have.

P2 comes with Puzzle Maker - an internal map editor that allows to create your own maps. The editor is simple and very intuitive. You can start building own maps in a matter of few minutes after launching it. You want to play user maps? You will need time - at the time of writing the review there were 350 000 (yes three hundred and fifty thousand user created maps) in the workshop. You can use tags to search maps with desired elements. User created map can be really difficult, but that's where beauty is - base game is accessible for everyone, but Portal veterans can test their skills on other maps. Don't worry - there are easier maps as well.
Monster of a game. Excellent on every level.
Bardzo spodobała mi się ta gra, ale nie mogłem znaleźć tego głupiego ciasta!

The best game of 2011.
I really liked this game but I couldn't find the stupid cake.

One of the best games of the year, and rightly so! The humour in this game is awesome, the storyline is interesting, and the gameplay is fun! Unfortunately, the game doesn't have much replay value. If you want more, you'll have to be content with the time attack challenges and such. Until a nice DLC or mod comes out, anyway...
One of the best and funniest games ever.
Just finished it, and what can I say... brilliant in every way. Loved the ending performance. :)
Funniest puzzle game yet, nice Single Player and COOP.
Portal ^ 2 :) But don't forget the original.
Amazing!

Portal 2 es el soplo de aire fresco. Un juego que demuestra que se puede figurar en una lista de los más exitosos del año sin tener que masacrar a cientos de alienígenas y encima ser sumamente inteligente y divertido. Es gratificante, tanto solo como en compañía, ya que a diferencia de la -imprescindible- primera parte esta vez Valve nos regala uno de los mejores multijugadores cooperativos nunca vistos. Jamás unas máquinas tuvieron tanto carisma. Una gozada.

P.D: [Mensaje desde el futuro: Quiero mi logro de Otoño 2017. ¡En 2017 lo seguimos considerando uno de los mejores juegos que se han creado nunca! ¡¡¡Imprescindible!!!!]
чопчоп

Nagyszerű folytatása az amúgyis elképesztő játéknak, megspékelve az Együttműködő játék izgalmaival és a történet humorával. A játékbeli bolt és a kinézet változtatása a Team Fortress 2-ből átemelve már csak hab a tortán. A teljesítmények mindegyikének megszerzése nem egyhétvégés feladatnak tűnik. Ha lesz megint leárazás, mindenképpen ajánlom ezt a játékot!
"Mir gefällt dieses Spiel wirklich gut, ich konnte aber diesen blöden Kuchen nicht finden."
Dieses Spiel muss man einfach gespielt haben! :)

Une valeur sûr, portal 2 est pour moi le meilleur jeu de reflextion sur pc. Aussi drole que enrichissant, il vous fera changer d'air.
포탈2 재밌어요

Just finished Portal 2 after buying it on sale.  This game is a bargain at any price.  They've upped the ante on the humor, on the puzzles, and on the ovarall Aperture storyline.  Superfun ending too!  Highly recommended.

Прекрасное времяпровождение, особенно же в сопровождении французского арманьяка, под вечер — живописать великолепие, творящееся на экране, положительно невозможно! Сев за игру в первый раз, я не смог сдержать овладевших мной эмоций! Мой батюшка также соизволил присоединиться к игре и выражает свое удовольствие и благодарит авторов за столь поразительный шедевр.
Great Game. 10/10
Cake is still a lie, but game is good nontheless

Und da ist Portal 2 der Nachfolger vom hochgelobten Portal 1. Valve hat es geschafft, in diesem Teil neue Ideen und sowie teilweise recht knifflige Test zu schaffen, wo man wirklich erst einmal denken muss : Was willst du hier von mir Spiel ?. 

Leider musste ich feststellen das viele Kammern wo man halt die Rästel lösen muss, sich extrem vom Schwierigkeitsgrad unterscheiden einmal ist man innerhalb von 2 Minuten raus, oder auch schneller, manchmal dauert es schon 5 Minuten oder mehr bis man da raus ist. Desweiteren muss man teilweise sich die Umgebung richtig genau,anschauen weil wichtige Felder wo man die Portale drauf schießen kann gut versteckt sind,das kann jeder sehen wie er will ich fand es des öfterns sehr störend ! Aber trotzdem hat Valve einen guten Job angelieft, aber finden man dieses mal denn Kuchen oder heißt es immernoch : The cake is a lie ?

Brilliant game with mind bending puzzles, great coop and fun achievements. 

A worthy sequel to the first Portal game.

The single-player campaign is great, very funny and challenging at times. The co-op makes this game beyond awesome, and also frustrating at times (for my partner anyways, I like to high five and jump into pits for fun). Definitely a must play!
